name: IMPULSE (gold)
description:
The goal of the game is to get the keys to open the door to get to the next level, getting the keys is not easy. On the way to the keys there are obstacles that will prevent you.

Pass the levels and share the achievements with your friends

The sounds in the game:

Omni Trio - First Contact (menu sound)

Aquasky - Spectre (game jingle)

Black Noise - Your Move

Black Noise - First Sense (intro sound)

You can donate money on development on author's Boosty page

Boosty - https://boosty.to/blacknoise.impulse
